thread.title: Kylie Jenner, Kendall Jenner Balmain ads: Stars look amazing | The
thread.title_full: Kylie Jenner, Kendall Jenner Balmain ads: Stars look amazing | The Advertiser

author: REBECCA SULLIVAN
title: Kylie Jenner, Kendall Jenner Balmain ads: Stars look amazing | The
text:
IT’S NO secret that the creative director of French fashion house Balmain, Olivier Rousteing, is a huge fan of the Kardashians.
He counts Kim K as a close friend — “I think Kim is one of the most impressive business women I’ve ever met,” he told Glamour UK — and chose Kim and Kanye to star in Balmain’s Spring Summer 2015 campaign.
Now Kim’s sisters Kendall and Kylie Jenner are getting in on the act.
They star in Balmain’s fall campaign, which features four glamorous sibling acts, including Gigi and Bella Hadid, Joan Smalls and her sister Erika. Brothers Armando and Fernando Cabral will also star in the menswear ads.
Models Gigi and Bella Hadid. Source: Supplied
Joan and Erika Smalls. Source: Supplied
After the success of Kim and Kanye’s campaign, Rousteing told Style.com his latest photoshoot, a “celebration of the unique and unconditional love of siblings is a natural progression from the spirit of last season.
“Watching them work together also made clear to me the universality of an age-old truth: the truly powerful strength, support, and love that family members can provide to one another.”
Brothers Armando Cabral and Fernando Cabral. Source: Supplied
Originally published as Kendall and Kylie look amazing in new Balmain ad
